title: China to gift 2,000 MT of rice to Sri Lanka
snippet: China will be providing 2,000 tonnes of rice valued at around USD 2.5 million as emergency food aid to Sri Lanka, the Chinese Embassy in Colombo said in a statement. The donation will mark the 65th anniversary of China-Sri Lanka diplomatic relations and the 70th anniversary of the Rubber-Rice Pact.

title: Sri Lankan President Rajapaksa seeks cooperation from Tamil leaders to 'rebuild the country'
snippet: Sri Lankan President Gotabaya Rajapaksa on Friday sought cooperation from the Tamil leaders to "rebuild the country" during a meeting with the main Tamil party here for the first time since assuming office over two years ago.

title: Kerala has to learn lessons from the Sri Lankan crisis, says FM Balagopal
snippet: There is good demand for fruits like dragon fruit, mangosteen, and rambutan. Hence, diversification of crops will earn more income to the growers, he said.

title: Cummins elated after Australia wins test series in Pakistan
snippet: Up there with winning the Ashes. Australia captain Pat Cummins was jubilant after his team thrived in testing cricket conditions to win the test series against Pakistan 1-0, and he compared it to routing England 4-0 in January.

title: Sri Lankan papers run out of newsprint as economic crisis worsens
snippet: Two major Sri Lankan newspapers are suspending their print editions because of a lack of paper, their owner said, the latest casualties in the island nation's economic crisis. The South Asian nation o
